title: Loaded Bible (Image)
description:
LOADED BIBLE

The three Loaded Bible one-shots published by Image comics from 2006 to 2008.
The story is initially Jesus vs Vampires in a post-apocalyptic world that&#039;s run by the church.
It may seem over the top, but is a very good story, well told and with great art.
Instead of issues each comic is labeled "disc".
This series was created by Tim and Steve Seeley.
They are all written by Tim Seeley.
Disc 1 is illustrated by Nate Bellegarde and Mark Englert.
Disc 2 is illustrated by Mike Norton and Mark Englert.
Disc 3 is illustrated by Mike Norton and Christopher Johnson.
The file list is:

Loaded Bible - Book 1 - Disc 1 - Jesus vs Vampires (2006).cbr
Loaded Bible - Book 1 - Disc 2 - Blood of Christ (2007).cbr
Loaded Bible - Book 1 - Disc 3 - Communion (2008).cbr
